name: Liptook
description:
Jump from platform to platform to collect points. Watch out for the turrets !!

Do not rage in this game or you control a little green monster frightened by lava! Your mission, if you accept it, is to collect the most points without dying in excruciating pain using your bullet-time.

Developer Stories:

This game was developed as part of an observation scene in the video game company Million Victories in 3 days.

By:

-Martin Nadaud
